A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The only good thing about the movie was the cinematography and visuals. 

The plot made no sense\, the character development from the previous movie got thrown out the window and the character development in this movie was a bit too forced (no pun intended)

I didn't even know Finn and rose had "chemistry" or a "romance" until she kissed him at the end of the movie. 

A big swing and an unfortunate miss from Disney on this one.
